node.title: Redbud haplotyping - Trinity Hamm proposal seminar
node.summary: Trinity, MS student in the Trigiano lab (I'm her MS committee member), had her Dpt Proposal Seminar.

node.title: The effect of habitat fragmentation on genetic diversity and differentiation; fine-scale population structure of Cercis canadensis (Eastern Redbud)
node.summary: Fine-scale genetic diversity study of Eastern redbud indicates two distinct genetic clusters in the Southern Appalachia.

node.title: Road trips for redbuds; An assessment of the genetic diversity and spatial distribution of Cercis canadensis in the US
node.summary: Genetic diversity study of Eastern redbud indicates two distinct genetic clusters across the species native range in the US.
